_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_MODEL_VALUE_: used to keep track of the number of selected icons
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_SIZE_: define the size of the icon
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_HALF_ICON_: allows the selection of half an icon
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_READONLY_: disables the emit function to change modelValue
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_COLOR_: define the color of the filled icon
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_HOVERED_COLOR_: define the color of the filled icons when the mouse hovers over the icons
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_RATING_: define the number of icons that will be displayed
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_ICON_: define the form of the icon that will be displayed
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_ICON_FILL_: define the filled version of the icon
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_SHOW_SCORE_: when set to true, allows the modelValue to be displayed
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT_: define the translatable text to be displayed
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_: interaktive Bewertungen mit anpassbaren Icons, Farben und Größen einzubetten
_A_RATE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT_EXTRA_: define the translatable text to be displayed and additional data for translation
